Episodes.Title: Stochasticity
Episodes.Plot: In the Season 2 premiere, the aftermath of the sexual-harassment scandal leaves Marty and his Pod adjusting to a new corporate culture at Galweather Stearn, where the interim CEO entrusts consummate closer Marty with sealing a big deal. Later, a boozy night on the town leaves Jeannie reeling, while Marty's relationship with Roscoe is in need of some repair.

Episodes.Title: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Planet
Episodes.Plot: In Las Vegas to help reinvigorate an aging casino, Marty meets the firm's newest consultant, a woman who was his biggest rival in business school. Meanwhile, Clyde is seduced by the Vegas nightlife; and Jeannie discovers a passive-aggressive adversary in Galweather Stearn's interim CEO.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Dobson, Evan Hart, Taylor Hart, Nia Long, Mather Zickel

Episodes.Title: Man-date
Episodes.Plot:
Marty and Clyde attempt to woo the business of new Las Vegas casino king, Michael Carlson, a maverick self-made millionaire who notoriously hates consultants. Meanwhile, Jeannie tries to assess how big a threat Tamara is by suggesting the two of them enjoy a spa day together. 
Monica makes an unlikely connection with her personal vegan chef, Tessa.
Episodes.GuestStars: Evan Hart, Taylor Hart, Ronete Levenson, Nia Long, Mather Zickel

Episodes.Title: Damonschildren.org
Episodes.Plot: Matt Damon (as himself) hires the firm to find a charity to enhance his image, but Marty soon realizes he may have to dig deeper than expected in order to keep the actor as a client. Meanwhile, Jeannie finds time to spend with Roscoe; and Tessa grills Monica about their status.

Episodes.Title: Sincerity is an Easy Disguise in This Business
Episodes.Plot: Marty's militant younger brother pays a surprise visit, while Doug and Jeannie work an assignment for an online-dating company. Later, Marty hits it off with a fellow consultant.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Violence, offensive language and sex scenes.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lisa Edelstein, Michael McDonald, Jenny Slate, Larenz Tate, Drew Droege, Ryan Devlin

Episodes.Title: Family Values
Episodes.Plot: Marty's plan to spend time with Roscoe conflicts with an executive retreat, while Doug sees his fellow Pod members in a different light after introducing them to his new girlfriend. Later, Tamara offers an intriguing revelation about her personal life, piquing Marty's interest.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mo Gaffney, Ronete Levenson, Nia Long, Jenny Slate, Eden Malyn, Annie Monroe

Episodes.Title: The Runner Stumbles
Episodes.Plot: Marty faces a moral dilemma when he discovers evidence of a banking client's role in a cover-up scheme. Jeannie attempts damage control with the Pod when an ex-boyfriend posts something shocking on the web.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lisa Edelstein, Michael McDonald, Larenz Tate, Morgan Krantz

Episodes.Title: Wonders of the World
Episodes.Plot: During a consultation with an adult-toy company, Jeannie meets an interesting suitor, while Doug comes up with a racy gift idea for his new girlfriend. Later, Marty's brother Malcolm drives a wedge between their father and Marty.
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Brody, Nia Long, Larenz Tate, Mather Zickel, Dennis Hill, Eden Malyn, Talia Tabin

Episodes.Title: Liability
Episodes.Plot: Doug and Clyde give depositions in a wrongful-death suit filed against a telecommunications conglomerate, while a casino mogul impedes Marty's efforts to close a deal. Later, Monica unravels when Roscoe moves out.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language.
Episodes.GuestStars: Larenz Tate, Nia Long, Mather Zickel, Elimu Nelson

Episodes.Title: Exit Strategy
Episodes.Plot: Marty looks to solidify a future career opportunity, while Jeannie has misgivings about hers; and Doug needs to step up his social-networking skills when a promising business opportunity drops in his lap. Later, tensions erupt between Marty and his brother, Malcolm.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language.
Episodes.Writer: Wesley S. Nickerson III, Theo Travers
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Brody, Nia Long, Jenny Slate, Terrence Stone, Larenz Tate, Jennifer Sun Bell

Episodes.Title: Hostile Takeover
Episodes.Plot: A mercurial Las Vegas casino czar ups the ante on a business deal with a frustrated Marty; and Clyde's club-owner friends look to him to expand their brand beyond Vegas. Meanwhile, Marty picks up some inside dirt on Tamara.
Episodes.Writer: Theo Travers, Wesley S. Nickerson III
Episodes.GuestStars: Adam Brody, Nia Long, Jenny Slate, Kevin Dobson, Mather Zickel, Evan Hart, Taylor Gerard Hart

Episodes.Title: Til Death Do Us Part
Episodes.Plot: Doug pops the question to his girlfriend, Sarah (Jenny Slate), who plans a shotgun wedding in Las Vegas on the eve of the Pod closing a major business deal. Marty's backhanded dealings lead to increased tension and unintended consequences for everyone.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Dobson, Nia Long, Mather Zickel, Jenny Slate, Horatio Sanz, April Weeden
